A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An honourable legacy and ode to a fantastic saga of there ever was one. Character development was seeping through the pores of the movie\, telling a great tale that had as much action as it did emotion. Some real standout performances from Adam Driver and from the lady that took over command from Leia (Her name escapes me). I've seen it twice already and plan to see it again. It is a perfect balance of original saga essence and modern day cinematography. Plus that lightspeed scene was just awesome!
